Name: Kotel Ne Gori: A Friend of Lena Boots
About the game: Kotel Ne Gori is first-person action-adventure game taking place in Samozbor Universe. Vanquish your opposition with rakes! The Plot Princess of Gigacrush was abducted and imprisoned into nine magical orbs. Only Kotel and his friends can rescue her. Game contains: Endless amount of rakes to fire on your adversaries Nine game stages to complete Six enemy types to chase you Faithful comrade follower that illuminates up your path Lots of breaking bars in half Circular saws moving on the floor The Princess who is waiting for You to save her
